mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (datetime, card_id, type_id) VALUES (strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', datetime(#{datetime} / 1000, 'unixepoch')), #{card.cardId}, #{eventType.typeId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM events e INNER JOIN cards c ON e.card_id = c.card_id INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT * FROM events e INNER JOIN cards c ON e.card_id = c.card_id INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE e.datetime BETWEEN strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', datetime(#{from} / 1000, 'unixepoch')) AND strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', datetime(#{to} / 1000, 'unixepoch')) AND u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT * FROM events e INNER JOIN cards c ON e.card_id = c.card_id INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId};
